p.span: Displays all of the specified fields of a Context as a table. This command is a "generating" command, which means it must be run as the first command.
xsGetContextFields context [IN container] [BY class] [SCOPED scope] FIELDS (field)+
| xsGetContextFields AirTime IN MyAirTime BY Tuesday SCOPED private FIELDS read write
Displays the values of the read and write fields of a Context called 'AirTime' in the container 'MyAirTime' by class 'Tuesday' with scope 'private'.
The container the context is stored.
The fields of the context to display.
The scope (private, app, global) where the container is stored.
The context is displayed in table format. See xsCreateDDContext or xsCreateUDContext for details about creating a Context.
